Body:
with codecs.open('testdata/models/routing_public.json', mode='r', encoding=
    'utf-8') as f:
    expectedResponse = f.read()
responses.add(responses.GET,
    'https://route.ls.hereapi.com/routing/7.2/calculateroute.json',
    expectedResponse, status=200)
response = self._api.public_transport([11.0, 12.0], [15.0, 16.0], True)
expected_short_route = (
    '332 - Palmer/Schiller; 332 - Cargo Rd./Delta Cargo; 332 - Palmer/Schiller'
    )
self.assertEqual(response.route_short, expected_short_route)
responses.activate
